PolicySid.description: The unique string of a policy that is associated to the customer_profile resource.

$ul: **account_sid**: The SID of the [Account](https://www.twilio.com/docs/iam/api/account) that created the customer_profile resource.

**results**: The results of the Evaluation which includes the valid and invalid attributes.
**sid**: The unique string that identifies the Evaluation resource.
